function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate implementation of UVGI systems","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Proper installation and maintenance of UVGI systems, regular monitoring of system performance","Technologies":"UVGI systems, monitoring equipment","People":"Building occupants, healthcare workers, general public","Owner":"Building maintenance staff, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Misinterpretation of UVGI effectiveness","Impact":"False sense of security leading to inadequate disease control measures","Mitigation":"Thorough education and training on UVGI technology and its limitations","Technologies":"Educational materials, training programs","People":"Facility managers, public health officials, researchers","Owner":"Public health authorities, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Inadequate monitoring of UVGI system performance","Impact":"Failure to effectively neutralize pathogens, leading to increased disease transmission","Mitigation":"Regular testing and monitoring of UVGI system output, adherence to recommended exposure levels","Technologies":"Monitoring equipment, UV sensors","People":"Building maintenance staff, healthcare workers","Owner":"Building maintenance staff, public health authorities"}]}
